title: Knife, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade, silver-gilt. Angular bolster, banded ferrule. Irregular shaped white porcelain handle. On front and back a scene with a flirting couple in front of a tree. Blue scalloped pattern with red scrolls on top and end of handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. silver, gold, porcelain. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-220.
